医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
皮肤痒？有可能是特应性皮炎吗？薰衣草精油可能正是您所寻找的研究人员证明，薰衣草精油，尤其是乙酸芳樟酯，可以有效抑制特应性皮炎，且不会引起皮肤过敏，从而提供了一种天然且易于使用的治疗选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/Itchy-skin-Possible-atopic-dermatitis-Lavender-essential-oil-might-be-just-what-youre-looking-for.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/Itchy-skin-Possible-atopic-dermatitis-Lavender-essential-oil-might-be-just-what-youre-looking-for.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=492170eb-3667-413e-97da-06841a87897a Mon, 08 Jan 2024 23:57:00 -0500 Itchy skin? Possible atopic dermatitis? Lavender essential oil might be just what you're looking for
人参的隐藏宝石：稀有人参皂苷成为未来医学的强大参与者《高级研究杂志》的评论总结了稀有人参皂苷 (RG) 的特性、应用和生产，强调了它们在治疗包括癌症和心血管疾病在内的各种疾病方面的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/Ginsengs-hidden-gems-Rare-ginsenosides-emerge-as-pot-players-in-the-future-of-medicine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/Ginsengs-hidden-gems-Rare-ginsenosides-emerge-as-pot-players-in-the-future-of-medicine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e654b87d-bb22-4e09-a4d6-79ab527ef44c Mon, 08 Jan 2024 23:22:00 -0500 Ginseng's hidden gems: Rare ginsenosides emerge as potent players in the future of medicine
新研究揭示重病住院成人中普遍存在的诊断错误一项针对全国学术医疗中心的重病患者的研究发现，近四分之一的患者出现了延误或漏诊。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/New-study-reveals-widespread-diagnostic-errors-in-seriously-ill-hospitalized-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/New-study-reveals-widespread-diagnostic-errors-in-seriously-ill-hospitalized-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e71b71d3-567b-48d4-bdf3-1b55c4a2c992 Mon, 08 Jan 2024 22:52:01 -0500 New study reveals widespread diagnostic errors in seriously ill hospitalized adults
定期锻炼是释放全身健康益处和降低疾病风险的关键细胞代谢研究探讨了长期运动如何诱导组织适应、增强心脏代谢健康并降低疾病风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/Regular-exercise-key-to-unlocking-whole-body-health-benefits-and-reducing-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/Regular-exercise-key-to-unlocking-whole-body-health-benefits-and-reducing-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b157d7aa-24b3-4919-84ff-7c7c67435d8b Mon, 08 Jan 2024 22:40:00 -0500 Regular exercise key to unlocking whole-body health benefits and reducing disease risk
斯克里普斯科学家揭穿了长期以来关于酒精和大脑的理论乙醇——酒精饮料中发现的化合物——会干扰一长串生物分子的正常功能，但这些相互作用如何影响酒精的行为影响尚不完全清楚。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/Scripps-scientists-debunk-long-held-theory-about-alcohol-and-the-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/Scripps-scientists-debunk-long-held-theory-about-alcohol-and-the-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f6614e23-77ed-4dc0-8a23-e592ed798e7b Mon, 08 Jan 2024 22:19:38 -0500 Scripps scientists debunk long-held theory about alcohol and the brain
研究显示，尼马特韦治疗与降低长期感染新冠病毒的风险没有联系最近的研究表明，在急性 COVID-19 期间进行 nirmatrelvir 治疗并不能降低急性 COVID-19 后症状的风险，也与症状反弹无关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/Nirmatrelvir-treatment-shows-no-link-to-reduced-long-COVID-risk-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/Nirmatrelvir-treatment-shows-no-link-to-reduced-long-COVID-risk-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aed53aa6-60fe-4dbd-adba-a5e4d2a94cfd Mon, 08 Jan 2024 22:16:00 -0500 Nirmatrelvir treatment shows no link to reduced long-COVID risk, study reveals
测量空气中的草过敏原水平可能是控制花粉症症状的关键测量空气中的草过敏原水平而不是花粉计数对花粉症患者更有利，因为新的研究表明草过敏原水平与花粉热症状的相关性比草花粉计数更一致。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/Measuring-airborne-grass-allergen-levels-could-be-key-to-controlling-hay-fever-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/Measuring-airborne-grass-allergen-levels-could-be-key-to-controlling-hay-fever-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=201ab684-4447-4f7a-b911-4b6e2385bc56 Mon, 08 Jan 2024 22:09:28 -0500 Measuring airborne grass allergen levels could be key to controlling hay fever symptoms
研究可能会扩大侵袭性儿童癌症患者的选择研究为髓母细胞瘤（一种侵袭性儿童癌症）患者提供了线索，并可能扩大其选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/Research-潜在-expands-options-for-病人-with-aggressive-childhood-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/Research-潜在-expands-options-for-病人-with-aggressive-childhood-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e4e0065-98f6-4b40-8f2d-6531448859bd Mon, 08 Jan 2024 22:05:38 -0500 Research potentially expands options for patients with aggressive childhood cancer
新测试可在症状出现前检测出帕金森病在帕金森病 (PD) 的发展过程中，早在患者出现任何症状之前，大脑就已经发生了导致神经退行性变的变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/New-test-detects-Parkinsons-disease-before-symptoms-appear.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/New-test-detects-Parkinsons-disease-before-symptoms-appear.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=81e50e19-7d8e-45a6-8744-72c60083019f Mon, 08 Jan 2024 21:59:39 -0500 New test detects Parkinson's disease before symptoms appear
3000 万英镑的临床研究将增进对 NASH 肝硬化的了解纽卡斯尔大学、爱丁堡大学和领先的研究驱动型全球生物制药公司勃林格殷格翰宣布，在全球范围内进行了有史以来最广泛的肝硬化临床研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/c2a330M-clinical-study-will-enhance-the-understanding-of-NASH-cirrhosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/c2a330M-clinical-study-will-enhance-the-understanding-of-NASH-cirrhosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7c40cbf-9e5d-4743-836d-9f7f9224cf7a Mon, 08 Jan 2024 20:40:38 -0500 £30M clinical study will enhance the understanding of NASH cirrhosis
